name: KWALL
tagline: A creative web agency for higher education
description:
KWALL is a digital strategy agency for Higher Education that creates experiences online that meet organizational goals. Being experts in design, strategy, and development we work with our customers to: 
Redesign web experiences
Improve online brands
Improve performance and online capabilities
Create strategies for online success
Secure and support online web platforms
Some of the ways we do that are:
Redesign websites and web systems
Clean up and re-organize web platforms
Migrate systems to other systems such as Content Management Systems
Implement new web features and systems
Support ongoing web platforms
READ MORE...
